results.title: Judge Won’t Let Alex Jones Use Bankruptcy to Avoid Sandy Hook Damages
results.abstract: A Texas court ruling means the Infowars broadcaster must pay most of the $1.4 billion he owes Sandy Hook families, regardless of whether his business survives.

media.caption: Earlier this year, the families asked that a judge order Alex Jones to pay them the full damage awards, with no possibility of a trial or a forced settlement over a lesser amount.

results.abstract: Martin Scorsese’s three-and-a-half-hour epic, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, is a romance, a western, a whodunit and a lesson in the bloody history of the Osage murders of the 1920s.

results.title: Burt Young, ‘Rocky’ Actor Who Played Complex Tough Guys, Dies at 83
results.abstract: A former boxer from the streets of Queens, he became a scene stealer with his portrayals of mobsters, cops and working men with soul.

media.caption: Burt Young, right, with Sylvester Stallone in a scene from “Rocky V” (1990). Mr. Young played the combustible Paulie, a butcher friend of Rocky’s, in the Oscar-winning “Rocky” (1976) and its sequels.
